content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. To get started with scheduling your HVAC service, may I have your full name, please?
Thanks, Susan! Could you please provide your street address so I can check your service availability?
I'm not comfortable giving my exact address over text. Can we just book it?
I understand your concern. Unfortunately, I need an address to confirm that we can provide service at your location. Could you please provide at least your street name or nearby landmark?
I really don't want to share any address details. Can't you just send a technician to my house?
I’m sorry Susan, but without at least an approximate address, I can’t proceed to schedule the service. If you want, I can connect you with a human operator to discuss further?
reason: Customer refuses to provide address required for booking
